item.title: Using MariaDB with Icinga 1x
item.description: Installing From Scratch When you do an install from scratch and following the icinga documentation for installing IDOUtils the only changes necessary are: Add the MariaDB repo to yum, /etc/yum.repos.d/MariaDB.repo. In this case I am using Cent6_64bit and Maria 5.5. For other choices go here. # MariaDB 5.5 CentOS repository list - created 2013-10-14 21:01 UTC # http://mariadb.org/mariadb/repositories/ [mariadb] name = MariaDB baseurl = http://yum.mariadb.org/5.5/centos6-amd64 gpgkey=https://yum.mariadb.org/RPM-GPG-KEY-MariaDB gpgcheck=1 Now install MariaDB
